name: code-editor
description: code-server deployed on kubernetes clusters, supporting multi-user and external authentication

scripts.code-editor:install: npm run assets:generate && helm install code-editor helm-charts/code-editor -n code-editor --create-namespace
scripts.code-editor:uninstall: helm uninstall code-editor -n code-editor && kubectl delete all --all -n code-editor --force && kubectl delete secret --all -n code-editor
scripts.code-editor:install:dry-run: npm run assets:generate && helm install code-editor helm-charts/code-editor -n code-editor --create-namespace --dry-run > out.yaml
scripts.assets:generate: npm run templates:generate && npm run cert:generate
scripts.dev:code-editor:install: npm run dev:assets:generate && helm install code-editor helm-charts/code-editor --set dev=true -n code-editor --create-namespace
scripts.dev:code-editor:install:dry-run: npm run dev:assets:generate && helm install code-editor helm-charts/code-editor --set dev=true -n code-editor --create-namespace --dry-run > out.yaml
scripts.dev:assets:generate: npm run dev:templates:generate && npm run cert:generate

author: Francesco Torchia
